Of course! Eating a snack after your workout can help you recover, refuel, and replenish nutrients lost during exercise. Here are a few healthy post-workout snack ideas:

1. Protein smoothie with Greek yogurt, frozen berries, spinach, and almond milk
2. Apple slices with almond butter or peanut butter
3. Hard-boiled eggs with sliced veggies, like cucumber or bell peppers
4. Whole grain crackers with hummus and baby carrots
5. Cottage cheese with sliced fruit, like peaches or strawberries
6. Turkey slices rolled up with avocado, tomato, and hummus
7. A small serving of quinoa or brown rice with roasted vegetables
8. Chocolate milk or a plant-based milk, which can help with muscle recovery and hydration
9. Tuna or salmon salad made with canned fish, Greek yogurt, and veggies
10. Baked sweet potato with plain Greek yogurt and cinnamon

Remember, the key after a workout is to get a mix of protein and carbohydrates that are easy to digest to aid with recovery. It's also important to hydrate adequately by drinking plenty of water or your favorite electrolyte drink.
